entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
